Tamalgamation chastised citizensamalgamation chastised citizens
2015-03-19 18:31:26Speaking with NBC television, Netanyahu insisted he was "proud to be the prime minister of all Israeli citizens, Arabs and Jews alike" after triggering outrage for warning supporters that Israeli Arabs were "turning out in droves" to the polls.
2015-03-19 18:31:26Some outside groups had vowed to "try to get out votes for a specific party, an amalgamation of Islamists and other groups," Netanyahu said, without giving any details, insisting he was not "trying to suppress a vote."
2015-03-19 18:31:26The White House on Wednesday had chastised Netanyahu for his remarks, saying such rhetoric "seeks to marginalize Arab-Israeli citizens."
